<Text: Ahardin:  Serving as a sound box, a reversed calabash is placed on the curved part of the bow on the ground.>

Text: Ahardin:  With the fingers of the left hand, as with the imzad, she defines the melody, while with the thumb and forefinger of the right hand, she grip the string with a regular gesture vibrate.
